text: Tamara de Braga Taxman (born February 24, 1947) is a Brazilian American actress, television presenter and writer. She is known and cast on television as Lena, the maid of the mysterious Selva de Pedra Simone who died in a car accident, later played the villain Dolores Estrada in the telenovela A História de Ana Raio e Zé Trovão. Currently lives the syndic and sorceress Leocadia, in the children's series Detetives do Prédio Azul. == Biography== Taxman was born in Woodstock, New York. Her father was from Rock Island and her mother was from Varginha, Minas Gerais. She went to Brazil at the age of three months. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
